text: Motion
A-Auu...
What's wrong, Tenka-chan?

It's the homework...
The book report... I have no idea what to write!

I see...
what book did you choose?

Well, this one...
The cover looked really cool...

Wow, this...
It's a really nice cover.
Wow... it's a really nice cover.

There's a man sitting under a cherry blossom tree,
with his eyes closed...
Is he sleeping?
Oh, um...

Probably...
he's not really sleeping in the story...

He's dreaming...
about cherry blossoms...
Wow...

The fully bloomed cherry blossoms...
falling... it feels lonely...

Closing his eyes,
imagining the fully bloomed cherry blossoms...

Yeah...
Tenka... felt a little lonely...
Hehe, I see...

Hey, doesn't it feel like you might be able to write
something now? About the book... a reflection...

R-Really...?
Oh, thanks, Chiyuki-san...!
Motion
